reviews.review: Game is really good i usually play when bored and makes it really fun
Honestly played the sheiza out of this game for years. sucks someitmes but honestly it's just so addicting, the competition is something you dont find quite the same anywhere else.
This game is like communism......Its good
Shoot. Kill. Plant. Defuse. Rescue. Protect. What's not to love?
Best competitive FPS, ever. Period. I've played since 1.5 and other than CS:Source, it's always been the best team play FPS.
Full russians! But still worth it!
EL JUEGO ESTA BUENO ! PERO EL SISTEMA DE VAC ES 1 PORQUERIA ! ME DIERON VAC SIN MOTIVO Y AHORA NO PUEDO JUGAR
En iyi FPS oyunudur fakat hileden geÃ§ilmiyor.

the bullet control is like if someone injected every known drug into your system, broke all your bones, smashed your fingers into little bits, backhanded your brain with a 20 lbs metal bat, put you in a spinning vehicle going mach 2, took you out, still dizzy, and gave you a gun to shoot someone right in front of you, miss every shot, but then try to shoot someone across the map with a SHOTGUN, and you headshot them for 150. Gotta love CSGO <3
Es mi juego favorito, no soy el mejor del mundo ni mucho menos pero disfruto cuando juego, con y sin amigos
this game gave me aids and cancer
